vision.notes: Presence of vision is inferred given that they are found in diverse aquatic habitats. Body may or may not have speckles, semi-transparent body noted in Chandramara chandramara.

chemoreception.notes: Catfish generally rely on chemoreception for foraging and social communication. Inference based on general catfish biology.

mechanoreception.notes: Catfish possess barbels which are used for tactile sensing of their environment. Lateral line system also likely present.
